Detailed Description

A BooleanChromosome is made of an array of booleans. Each gene can assume the value true or false. A faster and less memory demanding alternative to BooleanChromosome is provided by BitwiseChromosome with jenes.chromosome.codings.BooleanCoding.

Version:
2.0
Since:
1.0

final boolean [] jenes.chromosome.BooleanChromosome.getValues ( final boolean  values[]  )
